oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Farmers on relief and rehabilitation- "On the Move"
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Photo of a man and a woman, traveling on the side of a dirt road. Printed in "Farmers on Relief and Rehabilitation," between pg 42-43. The book was written for the Division of Social Research of the Works Progress Administration (WPA).
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: New Deal, 1933-1939--Tennessee ; Farmers; United States. Resettlement Administration. Land Utilization Division. Land Use Planning Section
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Asch, Berta; A. R. Mangus
